channel.title: Compiling Error but havent edited anything?
channel.description: Hi i downloaded the Rs client .. deobbed it then tried recompiling just to see if everything is how it should be .. but i got this error while compiling? any help would be much appreciated thanks. Pez [IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v51/pelham/compileerror.png[/img]

item.title: Compiling Error but havent edited anything?
item.dc:creator: @Pezlam Pezlam
item.description:
@Pezlam wrote:

Cheers ollie ive been trying to find that thread for a while … anyway that was deobbed with JAD… but i just downloaded popcorns deobber… seemed to be worked okay but when it got to the end i got slapped with this… and the .class files just dissapear ? wtf

        1 file(s) copied.
'debug' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
'~rsver.bat' is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Dumping jar file...
java.io.FileNotFoundException: *.class (The filename, directory name, or volume
label syntax is incorrect)
        at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
        at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:179)
        at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:70)
        at sun.tools.jar.Main.run(Main.java:150)
        at sun.tools.jar.Main.main(Main.java:1022)

done.
Press any key to continue . . .

[br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 03:10:15 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind i found that Freescape posted this :
and it worked straightened everything out Thanks 

@echo off
echo Deobfuscating RS2 client...
echo.

if exist runescape.jar goto deob
wget http://ul6.runescape.com/runescape.jar

:deob
title Deobfuscating...
java -noverify -cp deobber.jar archive
java -cp deobber.jar deob runescape.jar

title Renaming...
java -cp ZKM/ZKM.jar ZKM ZKM/rs2.txt
del ZKM_log.txt ChangeLog.txt deob.jar.BACKUP

title Decompiling...
md ~deob
cd ~deob
jar xf ../deob.jar
if defined DECOMPILER (
	"../jad.exe" -sjava -t *.class
) else (
	java -cp ../jode.jar jode.decompiler.Main --dest . ../deob.jar
)

title Finding LiveConnect class...
echo @echo off>> ~lc.bat
echo set clsname=%%1>> ~lc.bat
echo find "netscape" %%1>> ~lc.bat
echo if errorlevel 1 goto err1>> ~lc.bat
echo echo Found match: %%clsname:~,-6%%>> ~lc.bat
echo del %%clsname:~,-6%%.java>> ~lc.bat
echo goto done>> ~lc.bat
echo :err1>> ~lc.bat
echo del %%1>> ~lc.bat
echo :done>> ~lc.bat
for %%x in (*.class) do call ~lc.bat %%x > nul


echo.
echo done.
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling Error but havent edited anything?

item.title: Compiling Error but havent edited anything?
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Ollie:

need to rename it using ZKM, there is some hack you can do to allow compilation of unrenamed but you wont be able to do it.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 02:02:29 PM[/size][hr]may i suggest this: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7449.0.html

You steal peoples work, then distribute your pitiful understanding of those works, Ollie. So please just be quiet, I mean I know you, you’re sort’ve an “e-friend” but don’t be mis-informative.

Wrong, it’s not a hack… USE JODE to decompile! JAD wont be recompileable/runnable without some patching… Without renaming, there will be compiling collisions.

Read full topic
